name: Willow
description: "I want your soul... and your candy!" - Willow

heroPerk.name: Ghoulish Cackle
heroPerk.description: Increase <ModifiedAttribute>Ability Damage</> up to <Number>138%</> based on the percentage of your missing <ModifiedAttribute>Health</>.

commanderPerk.name: Ghoulish Cackle +
commanderPerk.description: Increase <ModifiedAttribute>Ability Damage</> up to <Number>138%</> based on the percentage of your missing <ModifiedAttribute>Health</>. In addition, ability Eliminations have a <Number>[Ability.Line2]%</> chance to conjure a <ModifiedAttribute>Phantasm</> (targets a nearby enemy, dealing <Number>[Ability.Line3]</> base <ModifiedAttribute>Energy</> damage in a 0.5 tile radius, <Number>[Ability.Line4]</> second cooldown).

abilities.name: Seismic Smash
abilities.description: Smash the ground, creating a fissure of energy which deals [Damage.Value] energy damage to enemies.

abilities.name: T.E.D.D.Y.
abilities.description: Deploy a husk-crushing robot bear which deals [Damage] base damage per shot and fires [Ability.RateOfFire] shots per second. T.E.D.D.Y. lasts [Ability.Duration] seconds.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Quickly dash through space, gaining [Ability.Line2]% increased movement speed for [Ability.Line3] seconds.

recruitment.sourceText: Earned through the "Door to Darkness" questline.
